MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the WA10 postcode area of St Helens affecting properties in Crossley Road and the surrounding area. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12pm midday. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:57am on the 28TH January 2021.
